1. Convert Binary to ASCII w/ python
01101111 01101110 01100101 01110011 00100000 01100001 01101110 01100100 00100000 01111010 01100101 01110010 01101111 01110011

2. Convert Hex to ASCII w/ python
636F756E74696E6720696E206865782069732030207468726F7567682066

3. Convert base64 w/ bash or python
YmFzZTY0IGRvZXNuJ3QgYWx3YXlzIGVuZCB3aXRoID0sIGJ1dCBpdCdzIGEgdXNlZnVsIHRlbGwK

4. Caesar Cipher
kl hyhubergb! zhofrph wr fubswr!
